plays.text: Penalty to Josef Vasicek 2 minutes for Tripping Pavel Datsyuk
Penalty to Glen Wesley 2 minutes for Interference Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Sandis Ozolinsh 2 minutes for High Sticking Kris Draper
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Steve Yzerman
Penalty to Steve Duchesne 2 minutes for Interference Bates Battaglia
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Steve Yzerman
Penalty to Marek Malik 2 minutes for Holding Kris Draper
Penalty to Bates Battaglia 2 minutes for Tripping Steve Duchesne
Goal scored by Tomas Holmstrom assisted by Steve Yzerman and Nicklas Lidstrom
Goal scored by Mathieu Dandenault assisted by Igor Larionov and Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Bates Battaglia 2 minutes for Roughing Darren McCarty
Penalty to Darren McCarty 5 minutes for Fighting Bates Battaglia served by Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Darren McCarty 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Niclas Wallin assisted by Sami Kapanen and Darren Langdon
Goal scored by Martin Gelinas assisted by Tommy Westlund and ROD BRIND'AMOUR
Penalty to Jiri Fischer 2 minutes for Holding Bates Battaglia
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Interference Ron Francis
Goal scored by Bates Battaglia assisted by Sandis Ozolinsh and David Tanabe
